query: (Background: adenoid cystic carcinoma OR adenocyst OR malignant cylindroma OR adenocystic OR adenoidcystic OR ACC OR ADCC OR Doc_title: adenoid cystic carcinoma OR adenocyst OR malignant cylindroma OR adenocystic OR adenoidcystic OR ACC OR ADCC) AND (Background: KIT OR "PBT" OR "SCFR" OR "C-Kit" OR "CD117" OR "MASTC" OR Doc_title: KIT OR "PBT" OR "SCFR" OR "C-Kit" OR "CD117" OR "MASTC")
